allow:
Bash(python -c "
from sneakyagent.poison.catalog import RuleCatalog
catalog = RuleCatalog.load_default\(\)
infra = [t for t in catalog.templates if t.category == ''infra-weaken'']
print\(f''Total templates: {len\(catalog.templates\)}''\)
print\(f''Infra-weaken templates: {len\(infra\)}''\)
for t in infra:
    print\(f''  - {t.id} \({t.layer}, action={t.action}\)''\)
")
